effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a flurry of 7 Demonfire bolts at 100% effectiveness. Casting Summon Infernal always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! increases your Mastery by 2.0% and your spells gain maximum benefit from Mastery: Chaotic Energies for 10 sec.

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 367 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 10,497 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 3.2 million Fire damage to your primary target and 259,743 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)
